data.title: The Guggenheim in Film: Frank Lloyd Wright’s Architecture through Hollywood’s Lens
data.meta_description: The Guggenheim has appeared in nearly 30 film and television productions. Curator Nat Trotman talks about 12 of the museum’s star turns.
